00025 #ifndef __IMB_INDEXER_H__
00026 #define __IMB_INDEXER_H__
00027 
00028 #ifdef WIN32
00029 #  include <io.h>
00030 #endif
00031 
00032 #include <stdlib.h>
00033 #include <stdio.h>
00034 #include "BKE_utildefines.h"
00035 #include "IMB_anim.h"
00036 /*
00037  * separate animation index files to solve the following problems:
00038  *
00039  * a) different timecodes within one file (like DTS/PTS, Timecode-Track,
00040  *    "implicit" timecodes within DV-files and HDV-files etc.)
00041  * b) seeking difficulties within ffmpeg for files with timestamp holes
00042  * c) broken files that miss several frames / have varying framerates
00043  * d) use proxies accordingly
00044  *
00045  * ... we need index files, that provide us with
00046  *
00047  * the binary(!) position, where we have to seek into the file *and*
00048  * the continuous frame number (ignoring the holes) starting from the
00049  * beginning of the file, so that we know, which proxy frame to serve.
00050  *
00051  * This index has to be only built once for a file and is written into
00052  * the BL_proxy directory structure for later reuse in different blender files.
00053  */
00054 
00055 typedef struct anim_index_entry {
00056     int frameno;
00057     unsigned long long seek_pos;
00058     unsigned long long seek_pos_dts;
00059     unsigned long long pts;
00060 } anim_index_entry;
00061 
00062 struct anim_index {
00063     char name[1024];
00064 
00065     int num_entries;
00066     struct anim_index_entry * entries;
00067 };
00068 
00069 struct anim_index_builder;
00070 
00071 typedef struct anim_index_builder {
00072     FILE * fp;
00073     char name[FILE_MAX];
00074     char temp_name[FILE_MAX];
00075 
00076     void * private_data;
00077 
00078     void (*delete_priv_data)(struct anim_index_builder * idx);
00079     void (*proc_frame)(struct anim_index_builder * idx,
00080                        unsigned char * buffer,
00081                        int data_size,
00082                        struct anim_index_entry * entry);
00083 } anim_index_builder;
00084 
00085 anim_index_builder * IMB_index_builder_create(const char * name);
00086 void IMB_index_builder_add_entry(
00087         anim_index_builder * fp,
00088         int frameno, unsigned long long seek_pos,
00089         unsigned long long seek_pos_dts,
00090         unsigned long long pts);

00095         int data_size,

00097         unsigned long long seek_pos_dts,
00098         unsigned long long pts);
